models.from sentence: The models that take the context into account perform similar to the baselines at the smallest recall numbers , but start to positively deviate from them at higher recall rates .

performs.from sentence: In particular , the ContextAtt model performs better than any other system in our study over the entire recall range .

competitive LSTM - baseline.from sentence: Compared to the competitive LSTM - baseline that uses the same relation encoder , the ContextAtt model achieves a 24 % reduction of the average error : from 0.2096 0.002 to 0.1590 0.002 .

ContextAtt model.from sentence: shows that the ContextAtt model performs best over all relation types .

ContextSum.from sentence: One can also see that the ContextSum does n't universally outperforms the LSTM - baseline .

attention.from sentence: It demonstrates again that using attention is crucial to extract relevant information from the context relations .

context - enabled model.from sentence: On the relation - specific results we observe that the context - enabled model demonstrates the most improvement on precision and seems to be especially useful for taxonomy relations ( see SUBCLASS OF , PART OF ) .
